name: Deloitte Australia
description: Working as a full-stack developer on the Deloitte Illuminate asset - An application that uses data and graph algorithms to provide insights into global supply chains. Due to a small team size, I have become intimately familiar with the end-to-end development and delivery of application features, and was responsible for their outcomes.
title: Graduate Consultant

name: ANZ
description: Worked on a full-stack project predominantly in Python. Integrated a backend Apache Kafka messaging system utilising Apache Avro payloads and Confluent Schema Registry. Customised an API generator to automate schema generation.
title: Intern

name: ThoughtWorks
description: An unpaid series of workshops and conferences that tought, and allowed us to practice technology consulting skills. Topics ranged from test-driven development, continuous delivery, pair programming, Agile and project management.
title: Software Engineer
